name: The forest brothers
description:
"The Forest Brothers is a game from the GGJ2020 that we made.

The theme was repair, we made a game where you repair an album, so the things that at first sight looks bad, evolve into something good.

Participants:

Game Design: Elias Herbsommer - https://eliosherb.itch.io/

Programmers: Florencia Vicencio - https://flor96.itch.io/ // Guillermina Lopez Granero - https://guill3rmina.itch.io/ // Elias Herbsommer - https://eliosherb.itch.io/

Artists: Paloma Roque - https://pamrockss.itch.io/ // Wendy Muldon // Antonela Gentili - Instagram: shorturl.at/dfjy5

Music: Iñaki Roque - https://iakiroque.itch.io/
